title: USB i Flash Drive U Disk Memory Stick Storage for iPhone Ipad Mac Android Phone PC 8gb 16gb 32gb 64gb 128gb (Black 64GB)
features: ✔【EASY AND SPEEDY TRANSFER】Directly plugs into your lightning port and USB port; experience up to 80 MB/s reading and 40 MB/s writing speed with USB port. (the SD Card is free).

✔【STRONG BACK STORAGE】Amazing transfer speed using its dual 8-Pin and standard USB connector, Automatically Record Your Photo/Video to Flash Drive Directly - external memory expansion, quickly free up memory on your iPhone/iPad.

✔【FORMAT FRIENDLY STREAMING APP】The FREE APP "i-Easy Drive"supports all major video and music formats so you can stream directly from the iphone flash drive, Saving you precious space and time. Record videos and take photos directly to iOS memory stick via APP.

✔【ACCESS SECURITY】Password protect your data safe on "i-easy Drive" (flash drive) and "iPhone" (in-app storage). Open TouchID and Password on setting to secure your whole storage, or Lock selected files with password. Perfect to protect individual privacy.

✔【COMPATIBILITY & WARRANTY】Lightning connector - Ensure 100% compatible and syncs with Apple lightning devices, can be used as iPhone 6 6s Plus 6 Plus 5s 5c 5 flash drive, iPad Air Air 2 mini flash drive. 18 Months Worry-free Warranty & dedicated email customer support.
description: 3 in 1,compatible with IOS, Windows, Android Device

The Standard USB 2.0 is not only compatible with all USB based computers and OTG enabled Android phones. But also it works as External memory expansion for iPad/iPhone/iPod/Mac. 1. Touch Secured file encryption for private files 2. Manage all your data directly on the IOS device(Create, copy, move, delete, rename) 3. Playback videos/music directly from external memory 4. Backup and restore your contact list Document viewer for all major file formats 5. Voice recorder/text editor.
